buildCommand: echo "[build] the current directory is $(pwd)" && cd ../../out/apps/github-server && pnpm install && echo '[build] custom build command completed.'
installCommand: echo "[install] the current directory is $(pwd)" && cd ../.. && npm -g i @vertesia/cli && pnpm vertesia:connect && turbo prune --scope=@dglabs/github-server && cd out && pnpm install && echo '[install] custom install command completed.'
